search.query: index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log sourcetype=watchdogng* | search tags="url_infos_fr" | convert ctime(_time) as Day timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | fields + Day name result | rename Day as Time, name as URL, result as Status | dedup URL | sort by _time desc | table Time URL Status

panel.title: FR - Connectivity of the Field Managers

table.title: Connectivity of the Field Managers from the last 2 hours

search.query: index=ai-platform-watchdogng-log sourcetype=watchdogng* | search tags=NCSPing name=FR* | convert ctime(_time) as Time timeformat="%d/%m/%y %H:%M:%S" | table Time, ipaddress, name, result | rename ipaddress as "IP address", name as "Name", result as "Result" | dedup Name
